suncertify.rmi

Class DBRemoteImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • suncertify.rmi.DBRemoteImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, DBRemote, RemoteDBMain

    public class DBRemoteImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements DBRemote
    DBRemoteImpl.java This class implements the DBRemote interface an is of type Remote and RemoteDBMain. This class delegates the remote method invocations to the it's instance of DBMain
    See Also:
